trans-unit.source: Writing a single-instance DSC resource (best practice)
trans-unit.target: 撰寫單一執行個體 DSC 資源 (最佳做法)

trans-unit.source: **Note:** This topic describes a best practice for defining a DSC resource that allows only a single instance in a configuration.
trans-unit.target: **注意︰**本主題所描述的最佳做法用於定義設定中僅允許單一執行個體的 DSC 資源。

trans-unit.source: Currently, there is no built-in DSC feature to do this.
trans-unit.target: 目前，沒有任何內建 DSC 功能可以執行這項作業。

trans-unit.source: That might change in the future.
trans-unit.target: 這在未來可能會變更。

trans-unit.source: There are situations where you don't want to allow a resource to be used multiple times in a configuration.
trans-unit.target: 有時，您不想允許在設定中多次使用資源。

trans-unit.source: For example, in a previous implementation of the [xTimeZone](https://github.com/PowerShell/xTimeZone) resource, a configuration could call the resource multiple times, setting the time zone to a different setting in each resource block:
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 [xTimeZone](https://github.com/PowerShell/xTimeZone) 資源的先前實作中，於每個資源區塊中將時區設為不同的設定，設定即可多次呼叫資源：

trans-unit.source: This is because of the way DSC resource keys work.
trans-unit.target: 原因是 DSC 資源金鑰的運作方式。

trans-unit.source: A resource must have at least one key property.
trans-unit.target: 資源必須至少有一個金鑰屬性。

trans-unit.source: A resource instance is considered unique if the combination of the values of all of its key properties is unique.
trans-unit.target: 如果資源的所有金鑰屬性值組合皆為唯一，則會將資源執行個體視為唯一。

trans-unit.source: In its previous implementation, the [xTimeZone](https://github.com/PowerShell/xTimeZone) resource had only one property--**TimeZone**, which was required to be a key.
trans-unit.target: 在其先前實作中，[xTimeZone](https://github.com/PowerShell/xTimeZone) 資源只有一個屬性 (**TimeZone**)，而這個屬性必須是金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, a configuration such as the one above would compile and run without warning.
trans-unit.target: 因此，上述這類設定會編譯並執行，而不發出警告。

trans-unit.source: Each of the **xTimeZone** resource blocks is considered unique.
trans-unit.target: 每個 **xTimeZone** 資源區塊都視為唯一的。

trans-unit.source: This would cause the configuration to be repeatedly applied to the node, cycling the timezone back and forth.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致將設定重複套用至節點，方法是反覆循環時區。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that a configuration could set the time zone for a target node only once, the resource was updated to add a second property, **IsSingleInstance**, that became the key property.
trans-unit.target: 若要確保設定僅能設定目標節點的時區一次，則資源已更新成新增成為主要屬性的第二個屬性 (**IsSingleInstance**)。

trans-unit.source: The **IsSingleInstance** was limited to a single value, "Yes" by using a **ValueMap**.
trans-unit.target: 已使用 **ValueMap**，將 **IsSingleInstance** 限制為單一值 "Yes"。
